changeSet.author: Roman_Yaskevich
changeSet.sql: create table user ( id int auto_increment not null, username varchar(255) null, password varchar(255) null, user_name varchar(255) null, user_surname varchar(255) null, email varchar(255) null, phone_number varchar(255) null, active bit(1) not null, user_description varchar(255) null, constraint user_pk primary key (id) )

changeSet.author: Roman_Yaskevich
changeSet.sql: create table course_user ( id_user int not null, id_course int not null, constraint user_course_fk foreign key (id_user) references user (id), constraint course_user_fk foreign key (id_course) references course (id) )

changeSet.author: Roman_Yaskevich
changeSet.sql: create table vacancy_user ( id_user int not null, id_vacancy int not null, constraint user_vacancy_fk foreign key (id_user) references user (id), constraint vacancy_user_fk foreign key (id_vacancy) references vacancy (id) )

changeSet.author: Roman_Yaskevich
changeSet.sql: create table user_role ( user_id int auto_increment not null, roles varchar(255) null, constraint user_role_fk foreign key (user_id) references user (id) );
